🚀 How to Trade Futures (Contract) on BitblessX

1️⃣ Open your BitblessX app.
2️⃣ Tap the 📄 Contract option — it’s at the bottom, 2nd from the right.
3️⃣ At the top, select the crypto coin you want to trade.
4️⃣ Set the leverage you want (1x, 50x, 100x, or 200x) 📊.
💡 Leverage lets you trade bigger with less capital — e.g., 100x means a small price move can give big profits or big losses, so use it wisely!
5️⃣ Choose *Long (Buy)* if you think the price will go up 📈, or *Short (Sell)* if you think it will go down 📉.
6️⃣ Enter the amount you want to trade (in USDT or coin amount).
7️⃣ Press ✅ Confirm to open your position.

📌 If the market moves in your chosen direction (Long or Short), you make profits. If it moves the opposite way, you take losses.

Trade smart, control your risk, and power up your gains with BitblessX Contract Trading! 💰⚡
